ngiemboon: Pɔ́ɔn légÿo pɛ́ʼɛ̀ tà ńkẅé pwó légɔʼ.
en: Don't go so far as to take a slap.
sound of a fat person sitting down

ngiemboon: À fǎŋ tà ńcʉ́ʼʉ lénéŋe ssé ńgӱo lê pwɔ̀b na kwɔ̀ʼɔ.
en: He is so big that to sit down, he just “pwɔ̀b” on the chair.

ngiemboon: Mé ně ne ńzíŋe lǔŋ, á maʼa pyàg, á vɛ́ ńtuɔ múɔ.
en: We were dancing, he threw the bomb, it burned the child.
sound of air exploding from a piece of paper
